short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simulate search engine queries from any location on Google and easily check and track your website or your competitor's rankings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simulate unbiased search engine queries from any location on Google and effortlessly check the rankings of your website or your competitors'.

Nightwatch's search simulator is an indispensable tool for SEO professionals seeking a straightforward and effective solution for rank tracking, enabling you to monitor website positions in SERPs (search engine results pages).

For those conducting numerous searches, encountering rate limits or captchas can be a challenge. For a more robust solution that surpasses browser and extension limitations, explore the Nightwatch app (https://nightwatch.io).
